name: src/cj.js
Collection
description: Collection+Json utility object.

name: getErrorMessage
description: Get the error message from the collection object.

return.description: error message

name: getLinkRelationUrls
description: Get the list of urls for a link relation from a collection or item object.

return.description: list of urls

name: getItemDescriptors
description: Get an item's data (descriptors).

return.description: object whose properties and values are the item's descriptor names and values respectively

name: getUrl
description: Get the url of the representation given by a collection obj.

return.description: url of the resource representation

name: getTemplateDescriptorNames
description: Get the list of descriptor names within a collection's template object.

return.description: list of descriptor names

name: getQueryParameters
description: Get the list of descriptor names within a Collection+Json query array.

return.description: list of query parameter names

name: makeTemplate
description:
Make a Collection+Json template object from a regular object whose properties are
the item descriptors.

return.description: template object

name: src/client.js
Client
description: API client object.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getFeeds
description: Fetch a list of currently authenticated user's feeds from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``FeedList`` object

name: createUser
description: Create a new user account.

params.name: usersUrl
params.description: url of the user accounts service

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``User`` object

name: getAuthToken
description: Fetch a user's login authorization token from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``string`` value

name: runAsyncTask
description: Helper method to run an asynchronous task defined by a task generator function.

name: src/comment.js
Comment
description: Comment item resource object representing a feed comment.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getFeed
description: Fetch the feed associated to the comment item from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Feed`` object

name: put
description: Make a PUT request to modify this comment item resource through the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: delete
description: Make a DELETE request to delete this comment item resource through the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``null``

name: CommentList
description: Comment list resource object representing a list of feed comments.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getFeed
description: Fetch the feed associated to the comment list from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Feed`` object

name: post
description:
Make a POST request to this comment list resource to create a new comment item
resource through the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: src/exception.js
RequestException
description: Custom exception object.

name: src/feed.js
Feed
description: Feed item resource object representing a feed.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getNote
description: Fetch the note associated to this feed from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Note`` object

name: getTags
description: Fetch a list of tags associated to this feed from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``FeedTagList`` object

name: getTaggings
description: Fetch a list of taggings associated to this feed from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``FeedTaggingList`` object

name: getComments
description: Fetch a list of comments associated to this feed from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``CommentList`` object

name: getFiles
description: Fetch a list of files associated to this feed from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``FeedFileList`` object

name: getPluginInstances
description: Fetch a list of plugin instances associated to this feed from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``FeedPluginInstanceList`` object

name: put
description: Make a PUT request to modify this feed item resource through the REST API.

params.name: data.owner
params.description: username to be added to the list of this feed's owners

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: delete
description: Make a DELETE request to delete this feed item resource through the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``null``

name: FeedList
description: Feed list resource object representing a list of user's feeds.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getUser
description: Fetch currently authenticated user's information from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``User`` object

name: getPlugins
description: Fetch a list of plugins from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginList`` object

name: getTags
description: Fetch a list of tags from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``TagList`` object

name: getUploadedFiles
description: Fetch a list of uploaded files from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``UploadedFileList`` object

FeedFile

description: Constructor

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Feed`` object

description:
Plugin instance file list resource object representing a list of files written by

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getFeed
description: Fetch the feed associated to this file list from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Feed`` object

name: getPluginInstance
description: Fetch the plugin instance associated to this file list from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginInstance`` object

name: src/plugin.js
Plugin
description: Plugin item resource object representing a plugin.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getPluginParameters
description: Fetch a list of plugin parameters associated to this plugin from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginParameterList`` object

name: getPluginInstances
description: Fetch a list of plugin instances associated to this plugin from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginInstanceList`` object

name: PluginList
description: Plugin list resource object representing a list of plugins.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getFeeds
description: Fetch a list of feeds from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``FeedList`` object

name: src/plugininstance.js
PluginInstance
description: Plugin instance item resource object representing a plugin instance.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getFeed
description:
Fetch the feed created by this plugin instance from the REST API
(only for fs plugins, 'ds' plugins pass null to the resultant Promise).

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Feed`` object or ``null``

name: getPlugin
description: Fetch the plugin associated to this plugin instance item from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Plugin`` object

name: getPreviousPluginInstance
description:
Fetch the parent plugin instance of this plugin instance from the REST API
(only for 'ds' plugins, 'fs' plugins pass null to the resultant Promise).

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginInstance`` object or ``null``

name: getDescendantPluginInstances
description:
Fetch a list of plugin instances that are descendents of this plugin instance from the
REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginInstanceDescendantList`` object

name: getParameters
description:
Fetch a list of plugin instance parameters associated to this plugin instance from
the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginInstanceParameterList`` object

name: getFiles
description: Fetch a list of files created by this plugin instance from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginInstanceFileList`` object

name: PluginInstanceList
description: Plugin instance list resource object representing a list of plugin instances.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getPlugin
description: Fetch the plugin associated to this plugin instance list from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Plugin`` object

name: post
description:
Make a POST request to this plugin instance list resource to create a new plugin
instance item resource through the REST API.

params.name: data
params.description:
request JSON data object which is plugin-specific and it's
properties can be determined by calling the ``getPOSTDataParameters`` method on this
resource object

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: FeedPluginInstanceList
description:
Feed-specific plugin instance list resource object representing a list of plugin
instances associated to an specific feed.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getFeed
description:
Fetch the feed associated to this feed-specific list of plugin instances from
the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Feed`` object

name: PluginInstanceDescendantList
description:
Plugin instance descendant list resource object. This is a list of all plugin
instances that have this plugin instance as an ancestor in a pipeline tree.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: PluginInstanceParameter
description:
Plugin instance parameter item resource object representing a parameter that the
plugin instance was run with.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getPluginInstance
description: Fetch the plugin instance associated to this parameter item from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginInstance`` object

name: getPluginParameter
description:
Fetch the plugin parameter definition associated to this plugin instance item
from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginParameter`` object

name: PluginInstanceParameterList
description:
Plugin instance parameter list resource object representing a list of parameters that
the plugin instance was run with.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

PluginParameter
description: Plugin parameter item resource object representing a plugin parameter.

description: Constructor

description: Fetch the plugin associated to this parameter item from the REST API.

name: PluginParameterList
description: Plugin parameter list resource object representing a list of plugin parameters.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getPlugin
description: Fetch the plugin associated to this list of parameters from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Plugin`` object

name: src/request.js
Request
description: Http request object.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: get
description: Perform a GET request.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to an ``axios reponse`` object

name: post
description: Perform a POST request.

params.name: uploadFileObj
params.description:
custom object with a property with the same name as
the API descriptor corresponding to the file and whose value is the file blob

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to an ``axios reponse`` object

name: put
description: Perform a PUT request.

params.name: uploadFileObj
params.description:
custom object with a property with the same name as
the API descriptor corresponding to the file and whose value is the file blob

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to an ``axios reponse`` object

name: delete
description: Perform a DELETE request.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to an ``axios reponse`` object

name: _postOrPut
description: Internal method to make either a POST or PUT request.

params.name: uploadFileObj
params.description:
custom object with a property with the same name as
the API descriptor corresponding to the file and whose value is the file blob

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to an ``axios reponse`` object

name: _getConfig
description: Internal method to create a config file for axios.

return.description: axios configuration object

name: _callAxios
description: Internal method to make an axios request.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to an ``axios reponse`` object

name: _handleRequestError
description: Internal method to handle errors produced by HTTP requests.

name: runAsyncTask
description: Helper method to run an asynchronous task defined by a task generator function.

name: src/resource.js
Resource
description: API abstract resource class.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: clone
description: Make a deep copy clone of this object resource.

return.description: clone object

name: ItemResource
description: API abstract item resource class.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: get
description: Fetch this item resource from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: data
description: Get the item's data object (REST API descriptors).

name: isEmpty
description: Return true if the item resource object contains any item data.

name: getPUTDataParameters
description:
Get an array of parameter names that can be used as properties of the data
object in PUT requests.

return.description:
array of PUT data property name or null if this list
resource's data has not been fetched from the API yet or it doesn't support
PUT requests.

name: _getResource
description:
Internal method to fetch a related resource from the REST API that is referenced
by a link relation within the item object.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``ResourceClass`` object

throws.description: throw error when the link relation is not found

throw error if this item resource has not yet been
fetched from the REST API

name: _put
description:
Internal helper method to make a PUT request to this item resource through
the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: _delete
description:
Internal helper method to make a DELETE request to this item resource through
the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``null``

name: ListResource
description: API abstract list resource class.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: get
description:
Fetch this list resource from the REST API using limit and offset as optional
parameters.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: getSearchParameters
description:
Get an array of search parameter names that can be used as properties of the
``params`` argument to the ``getSearch`` method.

return.description:
array of search parameter names or null if this list
resource's data has not been fetched from the API yet.

name: getSearch
description: Fetch this list resource from the REST API based on search parameters.

params.name: params
params.description:
search parameters, the ``getSearchParameters``
method can be used to get a list of possible search parameters

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: isEmpty
description: Return true if the list resource object contains any data.

name: hasNextPage
description:
Return true if the list resource object has a next list page in the
paginated REST API.

name: hasPreviousPage
description:
Return true if the list resource object has a previous list page in the
paginated REST API.

name: getItems
description:
Get an array of item resource objects corresponding to the items in this
list resource object.

name: getPOSTDataParameters
description:
Get an array of parameter names that can be used as properties of the data
object in POST requests.

return.description:
array of POST data properties or null if this list
resource's data has not been fetched from the API yet or it doesn't support
POST requests.

name: getNextPage
description: Fetch the next resource page from the paginated REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: getPreviousPage
description: Fetch the previous resource page from the paginated REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: _getNextOrPreviousPage
description: Internal method to fetch the next or previous page from the paginated REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: _getResource
description:
Internal method to fetch a related resource from the REST API that is referenced by
a link relation within this list resource's collection object.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``ResourceClass`` object

throws.description: throw error when the link relation is not found
throw error if this list resource has not yet been fetched from the REST API

name: _post
description:
Internal helper method to make a POST request to this list resource through
the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

Tagging item resource object representing a tagging of an specific feed with an

Tag-specific tagging list resource object representing a list of taggings made with an

description: Constructor

Make a POST request to this tag-specific tagging list resource to create a new

Feed-specific tagging list resource object representing a list of taggings applied to

Make a POST request to this feed-specific tagging list resource to create a new

name: ./APIDocumentation.md

content:
{
  "name": "@fnndsc/chrisapi",
  "version": "0.0.4",
  "description": "JavaScript6 client for the ChRIS API",
  "main": "dist/chrisapi.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "webpack",
    "precommit": "lint-staged",
    "start": "karma start",
    "test": "karma start --single-run",
    "docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "src/**/*.{js,jsx,json,css,ts,tsx}": [
      "prettier --write",
      "git add"
    ],
    "*.{js,jsx,json,css,ts,tsx}": [
      "prettier --write",
      "git add"
    ]
  },
  "prettier": {
    "printWidth": 100,
    "singleQuote": true,
    "trailingComma": "es5",
    "overrides": [
      {
        "files": "*.css",
        "options": {
          "useTabs": false,
          "tabWidth": 2
        }
      }
    ]
  },
  "author": "",
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.0.0-beta.49",
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0-beta.49",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.0.0-beta.49",
    "@types/chai": "^4.1.3",
    "@types/mocha": "^5.2.1",
    "@types/sinon": "^5.0.1",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.0-beta.2",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "karma": "^2.0.2",
    "karma-chai": "^0.1.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.2.0",
    "karma-cli": "^1.0.1",
    "karma-mocha": "^1.3.0",
    "karma-sinon": "^1.0.5",
    "karma-webpack": "^3.0.0",
    "lint-staged": "^7.0.0",
    "mocha": "^5.2.0",
    "prettier": "^1.11.1",
    "sinon": "^5.1.0",
    "webpack": "^4.11.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.0.8",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-importpath-plugin": "^1.0.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "axios": "^0.18.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
